page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
{XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX {X X {X } HARTLIP AND PARKWOOD AREA { X {X X {XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
This area is a very mixed area indeed. There is much contrast and a great deal of interest to town and country lover alike. Nowhere are you more than a few minutes walk away from relatively unspoilt countryside. All the while, however, the noise of the motorway - be it gentle hum or frantic roar, is never too far away. It is a little sad to see some of the last trees being ripped up to make way for yet more houses. The price of progress and happiness in 1985 ??
